title: Whatsapp Reality
description:
A full-stack Next.js web app that turns your exported WhatsApp chats into visual storytelling â€” private, insightful, and surprisingly fun!

Features:
- See who sends the most messages in your WhatsApp group
- Find out who replies the fastest
- Discover your longest streak
- View your very first and last message
- See how many hours you've spent chatting
- WhatsApp Web-style chat view: explore from any participant's perspective

âœ¨ Studio Ghibli-inspired design magic!

How it works:
Just upload your exported WhatsApp chat file (1:1 or group), and let the dashboard work its magic. All processing happens in your browser â€” no data is uploaded or stored anywhere.

How to Export a WhatsApp Chat:
On Android & iOS, go to the chat â†’ More options > Export Chat > Without Media â†’ Save the .txt file. Then upload it to the dashboard. Works for both Android and iOS exports.
